greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The smallest square referenced in A013929 (Numbers that are not squarefree).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..1000 from Robert Price)
example: A013929(4) = 12, 12 = 2*2*3, so 12 is not squarefree, the square being 2*2 = 4.
mathematica: s[n_] := If[(pos = Position[(f = FactorInteger[n])[[;; , 2]], _?(# >= 2 &)]) == {}, 1, f[[pos[[1, 1]], 1]]]; Select[Array[s, 250], # > 1 &]^2 (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 14 2020 *)
program: (PARI) f(n) = fordiv(n, d, if ((d>1) && issquare(d), return (d))); return (1);
results.author: _Robert Price_, Mar 17 2017
